{"id":1511974854,"question_id":3702,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 6 days","timestamp":1737158699,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1511974854/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Subarray With Equal Products","memory":"27.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxLength(vector<int>& nums) { //1 <= nums[i] <= 10\n        int n = nums.size();\n        int ret = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            long long prod = 1;\n            long long gcds = nums[i];\n            long long lcms = nums[i];\n            for(int j=i; j<n; j++) {\n                if(prod>INT_MAX/nums[i])\n                    break;\n                prod *= nums[j];\n                gcds = gcd(gcds, nums[j]);\n                lcms = lcm(lcms, nums[j]);\n                if(prod == lcms*gcds)\n                    ret = max(ret, j-i+1);\n            }\n        }\n        return ret;    \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-subarray-with-equal-products","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
